QuestData.Title: Eyes of the Eagle
QuestData.Description: Garwal hides himself behind an unnatural magic. None can see him unless he wants you to. There may be one chance we can take, though.$B$BMy enemy, the great eagle, Talonshrike, is said to have eyes that can see anything. If you were to take her eyes, then you would surely be able to see Garwal.$B$BTalonshrike keeps her nest at the base of a waterfall just to the southwest of the vrykul place called Skorn. If you touch the eggs in her nest, she will come down from the sky to kill you.$B$BGet her eyes.
QuestData.LogDescription: Ulfang has asked you to collect the Eyes of the Eagle. Return to him in disguise in the Rivenwood after you have done so.$B$BIf you somehow lose the Worg Disguise, return to Sage Mistwalker for a replacement.
QuestData.CompletionText: You have the eyes of the eagle?
QuestData.RewardText: <Ulfang howls loudly at your defeat of his great eagle enemy.>$B$BThe honor of the kill is yours. I wish that it had been my maw to finally close upon her neck.$B$BLet us not waste the sacrifice that she has made for us. Here, eat them!
